Text: Thanks!!! I like this better than vlc.
does this come with a regis. code or crack?
Seems to work well ... but it tells me that an update is available. If I download the update, will the activator work with that, too?
Great bit of software, but Webroot is flagging up Malware on the activator file and when installed two components try to access the internet.

Next_Level ... Regarding Webroot, I'm not familiar with webroot, but with Microsoft Security Essentials, you can exclude certain files and folders from their scan. I download to an excluded folder, as I always expect an activator or a key generator to be flagged. Regarding the internet access problem, all blu-ray players need to access the internet as blu-ray security is always changing. The player can't play the disk if if doesn't know the protocol.

I'm still wondering if the activator will activate updated versions?
